entities.name: bill

entities.name: lupin

relationships.description: Greyback attacked Bill, causing him to have a mangled face.
Lupin explained what might happen to Bill to Professor McGonagall.
Madam Pomfrey provided a nasty-smelling ointment for Bill's wounds.
